subject: Re: [junit] Re: splitting this list
msgSnippet: I like that idea. ...  ... I m sure I got it, but as with all initial signup confirmation emails getting thru the signup process and onto the list was
messageBody:
I like that idea.

-------------- Original message --------------
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Bradley, Todd" <todd.bradley@p...>

<snip>

> Mike wrote:
> > As a newbie user/lurker myself I don't recall reading the
> > FAQ, but have made a note to look it up now...
>
> Just today I unsubscribed and then resubscribed,
> to confirm that the FAQ is automatically emailed
> to new members. I wonder if the auto mailer
> doesn't work for everyone.

I'm sure I got it, but as with all initial signup confirmation emails
getting thru the signup process and onto the list was the focus at the
moment and I'm sure I just glanced at the FAQ. I can't be the only
one that does thi

Perhaps adding a link to it part of the standard email footer would
help keep it visible. http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm


Mike
